IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.check_duplicate_nickname') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.check_duplicate_nickname GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.check_duplicate_nickname @nickname NVARCHAR(10) AS SET NOCOUNT ON DECLARE @exist_nickname INT
SELECT @exist_nickname = COUNT(id) FROM dbo.Characters WHERE nickname = @nickname
SET NOCOUNT OFF IF @exist_nickname > 0 BEGIN return 1 END ELSE BEGIN return 0 END
